alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Portage, Mahoning and Stark Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Sebring to near Hartville to near Green to near Massillon. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canton, Youngstown, Salem, Columbiana, Boardman, Massillon, Green, Alliance, North Canton, Louisville, Campbell, Canfield, Sebring, Minerva, Hartville, Navarre, Austintown, Struthers, Atwater and Poland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
